TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable PeerContact extends System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class PeerContact Inherits Peer Implements IEquatable(Of PeerContact), ISerializable
type PeerContact = class inherit Peer interface IEquatable<PeerContact> interface ISerializable

summary.span: 代表使用者已擷取其擴充資訊的對等電腦。

span.span: Represents a peer for which a user has retrieved extended information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連絡人代表受信任的對等。A contact represents a trusted peer. A物件必須由遠端對等或「 近端分享 」 範圍外時，與遠端對等共同作業使用者。A object must be created for a remote peer or for a user to collaborate with the remote peer when it is outside of the "People Near Me" scope. A物件可以存在於其中一個在遠端電腦或遠端電腦的使用者上執行的應用程式。A object can exist as either an application running on a remote computer, or the user of a remote computer. 此類別的執行個體可以新增至永續性的方式儲存的連絡資訊。An instance of this class can be added to the which stores the contact information in a persistent manner. 從應用程式邀請通過驗證並加密。An application invitation from a is both authenticated and encrypted. 接受或拒絕來自對等連絡人的邀請的 UI 對話方塊也會指出邀請者是受信任。The UI dialog to accept or reject an invitation from a peer contact also indicates that that the inviter is trusted. 訂閱物件表示遠端對等電腦可以看到其已註冊的應用程式、 物件和目前狀態資訊。Subscribing to a object means a remote peer can see its registered applications, objects and presence information. 若要訂閱，呼叫端必須登入，才能對等共同作業基礎結構，透過或透過 Windows UI 登入。To subscribe to a , the caller must be signed in to the peer collaboration infrastructure via or signed in via the Windows UI. 所有其他作業不需要登入。All other operations do not require sign-in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示名稱可能會用來區分中的連絡人執行個體中其中可能有多個電子郵件地址，或者如果有多個對等使用相同的顯示名稱。A display name may be used to differentiate contacts in a in instances where a may have multiple email addresses, or if there are multiple peers with the same display name.

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources and optionally releases the managed resources used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當共同作業的工作階段的分葉，某些物件已不再需要。When a leaves a collaboration session, certain objects are no longer required. 如果必須進行此連絡人共同作業不是直接向對等主應用程式的任何其他端點與主應用程式預期會繼續與他們共同作業，主機必須註冊這些端點的應用程式內或在其之前處置這個物件。If this contact had been collaborating with any other endpoint(s) not directly registered with the peer host, and the host expects to continue to collaborate with them, the host must register those endpoints within an application or within its before disposing of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件用來代表郵件地址。A object is used to represent the mail address. 請連絡管理員可讓一個執行個體中的多個電子郵件地址。The Contact Manager allows for multiple email addresses within one instance. 這個屬性的預設值為 `null`。The default value for this property is `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫的對等未訂閱指定相關聯之前呼叫這個方法，就必須呼叫方法。If the calling peer is not subscribed to the associated with the specified the method must be called prior to calling this method. 雖然呼叫端不需要登入共同作業基礎結構，此方法才能成功完成，在成功呼叫或其中一個方法必須已完成，而呼叫者先前已登入。While the caller is not required to sign-in to the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully, a successful call to or one of the methods must have been completed while the caller was previously signed in. 這項功能只會公開在類別。This functionality is only exposed on the class. 這項功能不會基於安全性的對等的任何其他型別上公開。This functionality is not exposed on any other type of peer for security reasons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果呼叫的對等未訂閱指定相關聯之前呼叫這個方法，就必須呼叫方法。If the calling peer is not subscribed to the associated with the specified the method must be called prior to calling this method. 雖然呼叫端不需要登入共同作業基礎結構，此方法才能成功完成，在成功呼叫或其中一個方法必須已完成，而呼叫者先前已登入。While the caller is not required to sign-in to the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully, a successful call to or one of the methods must have been completed while the caller was previously signed in.

span.span: cannot be .

exception.span: - 呼叫端對等個體未訂閱 。

span.span: - The calling peer is not subscribed to the .

exception.span: - 呼叫端對等個體尚未呼叫 方法。

span.span: - The calling peer has not yet called the method.
Unable to complete operation.

summary.span: 傳送邀請，以加入寄件者所贊助的對等共同作業活動。

span.span: Sends an invitation to join into peer collaboration activity sponsored by the sender.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫端不需要登入基礎結構，此方法才能成功完成。The caller is not required to sign-in to the infrastructure for this method to complete successfully. A從受邀者不接受邀請共同作業受邀者相同。A from the invitee is not the same as the invitee accepting the invitation to collaborate. 如果邀請傳送至遠端對等電腦，安裝應用程式時，就會自動拒絕邀請。If an invitation is sent to a remote peer that has not installed the application, the invitation is automatically declined.

Additional overloads are defined on the class instead of the subclasses and . Calling this method requires a of . This state is created when the peer collaboration session begins.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSubscribed As Boolean
public: property bool IsSubscribed { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定目前的 是否已訂閱或取消訂閱端點。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying whether the current is subscribed or unsubscribed to an endpoint.

summary.span: 或者，這個屬性會取得或設定值，這個值會指定目前的對等主應用程式或裝載應用程式是否已訂閱或已取消訂閱這個 。

span.span: Alternatively, this property gets or sets a value specifying whether the current peer host or hosting application has subscribed or unsubscribed to this .

value.span: 如果這個 已訂閱這個端點，則為 ，如果連絡人未訂閱或已取消訂閱，則為 。

span.span: if this is subscribed to this endpoint, if the contact has not subscribed or has unsubscribed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在許多情況下，不等的主應用程式相同。In many instances, a is not the same as a peer host. 對等主應用程式具有的執行個體中遠端對等，和關聯性是它們已邀請的對等共同作業。A peer host has an instance within the of the remote peer, and the relationship is that they have invited the peer to collaborate. 端點都有 「 我 」 執行個體在它自己的連絡人管理員 」 和 「 對等主應用程式，但未指定關聯性。An endpoint has a "Me" instance within its own contact manager and the peer host, but the relationship is not specified. 對等主應用程式是否在，並對等連絡人不選擇、 其封鎖，而不是從主機連絡人管理員中刪除的項目可以具有的值。If the peer host is in the , and the peer contact chooses not to , its can have a value of blocked, rather than deleting its entry from the host Contact Manager. 沒有本機對等電腦、 遠端對等體，對等主機和訂用帳戶之間的多對多關聯性。There is a many-to-many relationship between local peers, remote peers, peer hosts, and subscriptions. 訂用帳戶是每位使用者，而不是程序、 應用程式，或網域。Subscriptions are per user, rather than per process, per application, or per domain. 因此，訂用帳戶相關聯物件都已經訂閱的連絡人清單，並從中預期的更新。Consequently, the subscriptions associated with a object are the list of contacts to which it has subscribed and from which it expects updates. 這些連絡人可能是已更新他們自己的應用程式、 物件和目前狀態資訊，或他們已更新中的連絡人資訊。Those contacts either have updated their own application, object, and presence information, or they have updated information regarding contacts in the . 這個屬性一律傳回`true`的物件是否因為本身一律訂閱連絡人代表本機或連絡人，「 我 」。This property always returns `true` if the object is a which represents the local or "Me" contact, since a contact is always subscribed to itself.

span.span: This object has been disposed.

which represents the nickname of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 適用於暱稱萬一有相同的顯示名稱的多個對等物件。A Nickname can be used for a object in case there are multiple peers with the same display name. 若要指定較大的共同作業工作中常用的遠端對等，共同作業工作階段也可以使用暱稱。A collaboration session can also use the nickname to designate remote peers commonly used in larger collaboration efforts.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnApplicationChanged(class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs appChangedArgs) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnApplicationChanged (appChangedArgs As ApplicationChangedEventArgs)

param.span: 要傳遞給與 事件關聯之委派的 物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟動、 註冊或從共同作業基礎結構取消註冊應用程式時，就會發生應用程式變更。Application changes occur when an application is launched, registered or unregistered from the collaboration infrastructure. 對等加入或離開共同作業工作階段，或變更網路端點位置時，它們也會發生。They also occur when peers join or leave a collaboration session or change network endpoint locations. 對等範圍變更也可能會影響應用程式中的變更。Peer scope changes may also effect a change in an application. 繼承自這個類別的類別可以覆寫這個方法，以在事件發生時執行其他工作。Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the event occurs.

span.para: 在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別實作，這個方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
In a derived class, be sure to call the base class implementation of this method so that registered delegates receive the event.
